page.title: 02KINGSTON DEPOT
page.content: { Kingston Depot}in California Road,was built in 1982. However,it originated in 1980. The head of Kingston Depot is Mr. Stanley Hibberd.The depot has 400 manual workers and 73 officers. It spends over Â£1 million each year,on repairs for the 7-7500 council houses in the borough. The word processors Kingston Depot uses are Wang models. Their V.D.U.'S are made by I.T.T. The main computers for the Authority are two I.B.M. 4000 series at Worcester Park. Apart from handling repairs to council houses,Kingston Depot carries out 'Highway Inspection',which is inspecting the roads and the pavements The Services Manager is Mr. Joyce. He is in charge of the Cleansing Department,which uses the dustcarts and street cleaning lorries. They also
